name: Malama Health
headline: Doula-led holistic support during and after pregnancy
description:
Malama offers doula-led holistic support during and after pregnancy at no cost to patients. Malama is in-network with Aetna, UnitedHealthcare, Anthem, Kaiser, and several Medicaid Managed Care Plans. 

Malama is backed by the Stanford d.school, Y Combinator (S22), Alpine Investors and more.

founders.name: Mika Eddy, Founder
founders.description: Mika is the co-founder and CEO of Malama Health, a maternal health company that delivers tech-enabled care for high risk perinatal conditions. Prior to Malama, Mika was the Director of Clinical Product Innovation at UnitedHealthcare, the largest health insurer in the world. There, she worked on achieving cost savings of $200M through digital health initiatives. Mika received her BA in human biology and MS in management from Stanford University, where she met her co-founders, Orlando and Daniela.

founders.name: Orlando Li, Founder
founders.description: Orlando is the co-founder and CTO of Malama Health. Prior to Malama, he was a senior software engineer at Airbnb working on experiences. Orlando met his co-founder Mika 10 years ago while he was pursuing MS at UCLA.

## NEW TO ALl this?
### personalized educational content
Q: WHAT DO MY GLUCOSE TOLERANCE TEST (GTT) RESULTS MEAN?
If two or more of your readings are high, you’ll be diagnosed with gestational diabetes
[ ![Glucose Tolerance Test Fasting Range](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/62d61e7ece25bb77f9eef8a8/1f5ea2a3-339e-4e8f-bb53-c9d13eec9891/Glucose+Tolerance+Test+Fasting+Range) ](https://www.heymalama.co/<https:/heymalama.co/gestational-diabetes/help-what-do-my-glucose-tolerance-test-gtt-results-mean>)
FASTING 
[ ![Glucose Tolerance Test - 1 hour Range](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/62d61e7ece25bb77f9eef8a8/5f3b4dbb-bd80-4a62-8364-45fa4fc93d73/Glucose+Tolerance+Test+-+1+hour+Range) ](https://www.heymalama.co/<https:/heymalama.co/gestational-diabetes/help-what-do-my-glucose-tolerance-test-gtt-results-mean>)
1 HOUR Range
![Glucose Tolerance Test - Two hour Range](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/62d61e7ece25bb77f9eef8a8/122c0c61-a7d2-41b7-be75-fcec705474d6/Glucose+Tolerance+Test+-+Two+hour+Range)
2 HOUR Range
[ ![Glucose Tolerance Test - Three hour Range](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/62d61e7ece25bb77f9eef8a8/fc5361f8-4680-4745-a3fc-3479ba4074f4/Glucose+Tolerance+Test+-+Three+hour+Range) ](https://www.heymalama.co/<https:/heymalama.co/gestational-diabetes/help-what-do-my-glucose-tolerance-test-gtt-results-mean>)
3 HOUR Range
*This chart shows the levels that ADA considers abnormal at each interval.

## How it works 
Get started in less than 5 minutes
[ ![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/62d61e7ece25bb77f9eef8a8/1b3aed5f-433a-4bd4-af4a-c269fb480235/1.png) ](https://www.heymalama.co/<https:/malama.app.link/app>)
### Install the Malama app
Track your pregnancy, receive real time personalized insights, connect with providers, discover in-network benefits and more!
[ ![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/62d61e7ece25bb77f9eef8a8/faae9ef1-9118-44f7-aa3c-10a332ad36a4/2A.png) ](https://www.heymalama.co/<https:/malama.app.link/app>)
### Sync your device(s)
Our App syncs with CGMs, blood glucometers, BP cuffs, activity trackers and weight scales (including Dexcom, OneTouch and ContourNext)
[ ![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/62d61e7ece25bb77f9eef8a8/183b3f76-ea90-469a-abd1-679761b00cdf/3.png) ](https://www.heymalama.co/<https:/malama.app.link/app>)
### log and sharE
Now you are ready to start logging! Share data with your care team as areport or in real-time with your providers
[ ![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/62d61e7ece25bb77f9eef8a8/e8cd1d4c-d459-499b-8709-e9037e3feabf/Malama-progress-page.png) ](https://www.heymalama.co/<https:/malama.app.link/app>)

#### TO KEEP track OFyour progress

## Doula & CLINICAL support
OB/GYNs, dietitians, doulas available for in-network support
  * ## Dr. Tiffany Herrero, OB/GYN MFM
Clinical Advisor
Dr. Herrero is an obstetrician-gynecologist affiliated with Lucile Packard Children's Hospital Stanford
  * ## Huliamatu Bah, Registered Dietitian
Dietitian
Huliamatu is a dietitian with the goal of creating a healthy lifestyle while educating the public.
  * ## Dr. LUCY Mackillop OB BM BCh MA
Clinical AdvisorDr. Mackillop is a Consultant Obstetric Physician, Oxford University Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust
  * ## Michele Tedder, MSN/RN
RN and Health Coach 
Nurse Tedder is a public health consultant and obesity advocate, who leads Malama’s postpartum wellness program as a health coach.
  * ## Emily Mitchell MS, RDN, CDE, CSSD
Clinical Diabetes Educator
Emily is a Registered Dietitian and a Clinical Diabetes Educator with a focus on Maternal Nutrition
  * ## Bea Tinoco
Doula
Bea has been a doula for 10+ years and is currently studying to become a midwife. She is fluent in English and Spanish.

### LEARN MORE
Featured
[ ](https://www.heymalama.co/</guide-to-glucometers/guide-to-glucometer-coverage-2023>)
[Malama Health’s Guide to Glucometer Coverage ](https://www.heymalama.co/</guide-to-glucometers/guide-to-glucometer-coverage-2023>)
In this post, we explain the difference between glucometers, lancets and strips, how to pick a glucometer, which glucometers are covered by the major health plans, and how to find free strips.
[Read More →](https://www.heymalama.co/</guide-to-glucometers/guide-to-glucometer-coverage-2023>)

[Top 5 Gestational Diabetes Apps for Pregnant Patients](https://www.heymalama.co/</guide-to-glucometers/top-5-gestational-diabetes-apps-for-pregnant-patients>)
Top 5 Gestational Diabetes Apps for Pregnant Patients. 
Looking for the best gestational diabetes app to help manage your condition? Check out our list of the top tracking apps with features like blood glucose level tracking, food intake monitoring, medication reminders, and more. Find out which apps are free, which ones offer paid features, and read real user reviews before making your choice.
[Read More →](https://www.heymalama.co/</guide-to-glucometers/top-5-gestational-diabetes-apps-for-pregnant-patients>)
[ ](https://www.heymalama.co/</guide-to-glucometers/which-meters-are-covered-by-major-health-plans>)
[Which meters are covered by major health plans?](https://www.heymalama.co/</guide-to-glucometers/which-meters-are-covered-by-major-health-plans>)
Find the meter covered by your plan. This analysis of over 50 different health plans determined that the most common glucometer brands covered include OneTouch, Contour Next, and Accu-chek.
[Read More →](https://www.heymalama.co/</guide-to-glucometers/which-meters-are-covered-by-major-health-plans>)
[ ](https://www.heymalama.co/</guide-to-glucometers/which-glucometer-is-most-accurate>)
[Which meter is most accurate for tracking blood sugar levels ](https://www.heymalama.co/</guide-to-glucometers/which-glucometer-is-most-accurate>)
Several studies have compared the accuracy of different glucometers for measuring blood glucose values (TLDR; the Contour Next EZ has been found to have the highest overall accuracy) 
[Read More →](https://www.heymalama.co/</guide-to-glucometers/which-glucometer-is-most-accurate>)

## Doula & CLINICAL support
OB/GYNs, dietitians, doulas available for in-network support
  * ## Dr. Tiffany Herrero, OB/GYN MFM
Clinical Advisor
Dr. Herrero is an obstetrician-gynecologist affiliated with Lucile Packard Children's Hospital Stanford
  * ## Huliamatu Bah, Registered Dietitian
Dietitian
Huliamatu is a dietitian with the goal of creating a healthy lifestyle while educating the public.
  * ## Dr. LUCY Mackillop OB BM BCh MA
Clinical AdvisorDr. Mackillop is a Consultant Obstetric Physician, Oxford University Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust
  * ## Michele Tedder, MSN/RN
RN and Health Coach 
Nurse Tedder is a public health consultant and obesity advocate, who leads Malama’s postpartum wellness program as a health coach.
  * ## Emily Mitchell MS, RDN, CDE, CSSD
Clinical Diabetes Educator
Emily is a Registered Dietitian and a Clinical Diabetes Educator with a focus on Maternal Nutrition
  * ## Bea Tinoco
Doula
Bea has been a doula for 10+ years and is currently studying to become a midwife. She is fluent in English and Spanish.

generated_description:
**Malama Health: A Snapshot**

Founded in 2022 and based in Stanford, California, Malama Health is a promising startup dedicated to doula-led holistic support for families during and after pregnancy. Imagine a world where every expecting mother has personalized, comprehensive support—well, that’s what Malama is striving for.

Their mission is clear: they aim to provide critical support without any cost to patients. Malama is in-network with major insurance providers like Aetna, UnitedHealthcare, and Anthem, along with various Medicaid Managed Care Plans, ensuring that their services are accessible to many.

**The Essence of Malama Health**

At its core, Malama Health is about focusing on the entire journey of motherhood. They offer:

- **Personalized Pregnancy Support**: From finding the right doula to tailored education on pregnancy health, Malama meets mothers where they are.
- **Postpartum Wellness**: Understanding that the journey doesn't stop once the baby arrives, they provide ongoing support to new parents as they transition into parenthood.
- **Tech-Enhanced Care**: Their app tracks various metrics, making it easier for mothers to manage their health and communicate with healthcare providers.

**Backed by the Best**

Malama has distinguished itself not just through its innovative approach but also with backing from recognized institutions like the Stanford d.school and Y Combinator (Batch S22). This sort of endorsement speaks volumes about their potential.

**Keeping it Small but Mighty**

With a lean team of just three employees, Malama balances a startup energy with a dedication to quality service. Each team member plays a pivotal role in providing comprehensive care, which shows that you don’t need a large team to make a significant impact.

**Community-Centric Approach**

Malama understands the importance of community, with support teams consisting of OB/GYNs, dietitians, and experienced doulas. This integrated approach ensures that families receive the full spectrum of care tailored to their unique situations.

**Conclusion**

In a landscape where healthcare can often feel impersonal and transactional, Malama Health sets itself apart by infusing humanity into the maternal health experience. They are building a community of healthy mamas and babies—over 50,000 strong—as they pave the way to better maternal health outcomes. For anyone navigating the often challenging path of pregnancy and early motherhood, Malama Health could be a crucial ally. 

Explore more about their services at [Malama Health's Website](https://www.heymalama.co).
